Reviews.Title: “Lovely stay at River Chateau Hotel”
Reviews.Author: beckph
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights feb 2012 visited rome italy england rugby 6 nations located city centre major plus nice residential 15 minutes walk stadio hotel restaurant wasnt visited numerous barsrestaurants minutes walk hotel breakfast nice lot choice lovely appointed sized balcony didnt snowing stayed bus terminus 5 minutes walk crossing ponte bridge 15 minutes tram flaminio terminus santa maria del popolo definitely stay visit rome

Reviews.Title: “Triple "A" service and comfort”
Reviews.Author: jaccuse
Reviews.Content: stayed river chateau six nights highly recommend hotel exceptionally helpful friendly staff quality decor comfort excellent bar restaurant found difficult restaurants rome venture centre restaurant hotel dining experiences food authentic roman cuisine prepared fresh ingredients wine excellent meal represented value money hotel situated north centre rome nice plenty restaurants bars seriously recommend cab centre costs 10 12 euros buses trams town location advantage quieter feels personal establishments centre bored tourists river chateau comparable service hotels stayed

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Hotel, excellent rooms and service.”
Reviews.Author: Anon190832
Reviews.Content: lovely hotel unexpectedly balcony ideal relaxing busy day rome service bar serving drinks sandwiches breakfast excellent lovely breakfast hotel fairly close bus stop transport city centre distance walk tabac shop close purchase bus tickets dont forget validate bus selection bars restaurants close hotel expensive busy night particularly weekend restaurant attached hotel weekend

Reviews.Title: “When in Rome”
Reviews.Author: Deborah1592
Reviews.Content: stayed river chateau husband daughter researching numerous hotels rome definitely decision stay triple standard beautiful spacious european standards hot rome cool clean respite day sightseeing breakfast included price start day cereals pastries meats cheeses husband riser breakfast hours cup coffee staff prepare hotel tourist enjoyed neighborhood bus taxi 1015 euros city lots restaraunts gelatto shops short walk hotel staff hotel desk friendly helped deal arrangements various sights rome spoke couple tour similar experience hotel staying definitely stay rome
